CONSTRUCTION CONTRACT
CCDC 2 - 2020 STIPULATED PRICE CONTRACT

PROJECT: Pacific Ridge Condominium Development
         4567 Kingsway, Burnaby, British Columbia

BETWEEN:

OWNER: Pacific Ridge Developments Inc.
       Suite 450, 5678 Imperial Street
       Burnaby, BC V5J 1E9

AND:

CONTRACTOR: Westcoast Builders Ltd.
            2100 Main Street
            Vancouver, BC V5T 3C5

CONTRACT DATE: February 1, 2023

ARTICLE A-1 - THE WORK

A-1.1 The Contractor shall perform the Work required by the Contract Documents for the construction of a 42-unit residential condominium building including:
      - Site preparation and excavation
      - Foundation and structural concrete
      - Building envelope and waterproofing
      - Mechanical, electrical, and plumbing systems
      - Interior finishing and millwork
      - Landscaping and site services

ARTICLE A-2 - CONTRACT PRICE

A-2.1 The Owner shall pay the Contractor for the performance of the Work the sum of EIGHT MILLION SEVEN HUNDRED AND FIFTY THOUSAND DOLLARS ($8,750,000.00 CAD), subject to adjustments in accordance with the Contract.

ARTICLE A-3 - PAYMENT TERMS

A-3.1 Progress payments shall be made monthly based on the value of work completed, less a 10% holdback as required by the Builders Lien Act.

A-3.2 The Contractor shall submit progress claims on the last day of each month.

A-3.3 The Owner shall pay each progress claim within 17 days of receipt, as required by the Builders Lien Act, S.B.C. 1997, c. 45.

A-3.4 Payment Schedule (estimated):
      Invoice 1 (April 2023):      $   750,000  - Foundation work
      Invoice 2 (May 2023):        $   900,000  - Structural concrete
      Invoice 3 (June 2023):       $   850,000  - Framing
      Invoice 4 (July 2023):       $ 1,100,000  - Envelope & roofing
      Invoice 5 (August 2023):     $   950,000  - MEP rough-in
      Invoice 6 (September 2023):  $   800,000  - Exterior finishing
      Invoice 7 (October 2023):    $ 1,050,000  - Interior work
      Invoice 8 (November 2023):   $   875,000  - Unit finishing
      Invoice 9 (December 2023):   $   550,000  - Final completion
      Invoice 10 (January 2024):   $   925,000  - Landscaping & deficiencies
      TOTAL:                       $ 8,750,000

ARTICLE A-4 - CONTRACT TIME

A-4.1 Date of Commencement: March 1, 2023

A-4.2 Date of Substantial Performance: January 15, 2024

A-4.3 Total Construction Time: 10.5 months

ARTICLE A-5 - LIQUIDATED DAMAGES

A-5.1 If the Contractor fails to achieve Substantial Performance by the date specified, the Owner may deduct $2,000 per day as liquidated damages.

ARTICLE A-6 - STATUTORY REQUIREMENTS

A-6.1 This Contract is subject to the Builders Lien Act, S.B.C. 1997, c. 45.

A-6.2 All work shall comply with the British Columbia Building Code and all applicable municipal bylaws.

A-6.3 The Contractor shall obtain all necessary permits and licenses.

ARTICLE A-7 - INSURANCE

A-7.1 The Contractor shall maintain:
      - Comprehensive General Liability Insurance: $5,000,000
      - Workers' Compensation Coverage as required by WorkSafeBC
      - Builder's Risk Insurance for full replacement value

ARTICLE A-8 - WARRANTY

A-8.1 The Contractor warrants all work and materials for a period of one year from the date of Substantial Performance.

A-8.2 The Contractor shall assign all manufacturer warranties to the Owner.

ARTICLE A-9 - DISPUTE RESOLUTION

A-9.1 Any disputes shall first be submitted to mediation.

A-9.2 If mediation is unsuccessful, disputes shall be resolved by arbitration in accordance with the Arbitration Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 55.

ARTICLE A-10 - GENERAL CONDITIONS

A-10.1 The General Conditions of CCDC 2 - 2020 are incorporated into and form part of this Contract.

ARTICLE A-11 - GOVERNING LAW

A-11.1 This Contract shall be governed by the laws of the Province of British Columbia.

EXECUTED this 1st day of February, 2023.
